name: Up The Topless Pit no one comes back from the dead
name_original: Up The Topless Pit no one comes back from the dead
description:
You're dead!... Or are you?

Your soul burns to live again so try and climb up the pit of death before the pit itself gets you! Will you ever reach the top?

Collect coins along the way up to make the walls retract back! Fight for your survival! How long can you keep up?
